00032 //----------------------------------------------------------
00033 bool
00034 BscIsExpr( const SBscToken* tokens, const BscArrayTable& arrayTable, const BscVarTable& varTable, unsigned int* tokensReadOut )
00035 {
00036         B_ASSERT( tokens != 0 );
00037 
00038         SafeOffset tokensRead( tokensReadOut );
00039 
00040         tokensRead = 0;
00041         bool isExpr = true;
00042         do
00043         {
00044                 if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId == BL_LPAREN )
00045                 {
00047                         ++tokensRead;
00048 
00050                         unsigned int subTokensRead = 0;
00051                         if ( !BscIsExpr( tokens + tokensRead, arrayTable, varTable, &subTokensRead ) )
00052                         {
00053                                 tokensRead += subTokensRead;
00054                                 return false;
00055                         }
00056                         tokensRead += subTokensRead;
00057 
00059                         if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId != BL_RPAREN )
00060                                 return false;
00061                         ++tokensRead;
00062                 }
00063                 else
00064                 {
00065                         unsigned int subTokensRead = 0;
00066                         if ( BscIsNumber( tokens + tokensRead, &subTokensRead ) )
00067                                 tokensRead += subTokensRead;
00068                         else if ( BscIsArrayRef( tokens + tokensRead, arrayTable, varTable, &subTokensRead ) )
00069                                 tokensRead += subTokensRead;
00070                         else if ( BscIsCallback( tokens + tokensRead, varTable, &subTokensRead ) )
00071                                 tokensRead += subTokensRead;
00072                         else
00073                         {
00075                                 tokensRead += subTokensRead;
00076                                 return false;
00077                         }
00078                 }
00079 
00081                 if ( IsOp( tokens + tokensRead ) )
00082                 {
00084                         ++tokensRead;
00085                 }
00086                 else
00087                 {
00089                         break;
00090                 }
00091         } while ( true );
00092 
00094         return true;
00095 }

00097 //----------------------------------------------------------
00098 unsigned int
00099 BscParseExpr( URef< UExprTerm >* exprOut, const SBscToken* tokens, const BscArrayTable& arrayTable, const BscVarTable& varTable )
00100 {
00101         B_ASSERT( tokens != 0 );
00102         B_ASSERT( exprOut != 0 );
00103 
00105         B_ASSERT( BscIsExpr( tokens, arrayTable, varTable ) );
00106         unsigned int tokensRead = 0;
00107 
00110         URef< UExpr > expr = gUExprMgr->CreateExpression();
00111 
00113         unsigned int termTokensRead = 0;
00114         URef< UExprTerm > term;
00115         tokensRead += ParseTerm( &term, tokens, arrayTable, varTable );
00116 
00118         expr->AddTerm( UExpr::EO_ADD, term );
00119 
00121         while ( IsOp( tokens + tokensRead ) )
00122         {
00124                 UExpr::EMATHOP mathOp = UExpr::EO_ADD;
00125                 switch ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId )
00126                 {
00127                 case BL_PLUS:
00128                         mathOp = UExpr::EO_ADD;
00129                         break;
00130                 case BL_MINUS:
00131                         mathOp = UExpr::EO_SUBTRACT;
00132                         break;
00133                 case BL_ASTERISK:
00134                         mathOp = UExpr::EO_MULTIPLY;
00135                         break;
00136                 case BL_SLASH:
00137                         mathOp = UExpr::EO_DIVIDE;
00138                         break;
00139                 case BL_PERCENT:
00140                         mathOp = UExpr::EO_MODULUS;
00141                         break;
00142                 case BL_LESS:
00143                         mathOp = UExpr::EO_CMPLESS;
00144                         break;
00145                 case BL_GREATER:
00146                         mathOp = UExpr::EO_CMPGREATER;
00147                         break;
00148                 case BL_LESSEQUAL:
00149                         mathOp = UExpr::EO_CMPLESSEQUAL;
00150                         break;
00151                 case BL_GREATEREQUAL:
00152                         mathOp = UExpr::EO_CMPGREATEREQUAL;
00153                         break;
00154                 case BL_NOTEQUAL:
00155                         mathOp = UExpr::EO_CMPNOTEQUAL;
00156                         break;
00157                 case BL_ISEQUAL:
00158                         mathOp = UExpr::EO_CMPEQUAL;
00159                         break;
00160                 case BL_LOGICALAND:
00161                         mathOp = UExpr::EO_CMPAND;
00162                         break;
00163                 case BL_LOGICALOR:
00164                         mathOp = UExpr::EO_CMPOR;
00165                         break;
00166                 default:
00168                         B_ASSERT( false );
00169                 };
00170 
00172                 ++tokensRead;
00173 
00175                 tokensRead += ParseTerm( &term, tokens + tokensRead, arrayTable, varTable );
00176                 expr->AddTerm( mathOp, term );
00177         }
00178 
00180         if ( expr->GetTermCount() == 1 )
00181                 *exprOut = expr->GetTerm( 0 );
00182         else
00183                 *exprOut = expr;
00184 
00185         return tokensRead;
00186 }

00188 //----------------------------------------------------------
00189 unsigned int
00190 ParseTerm( URef< UExprTerm >* term, const SBscToken* tokens, const BscArrayTable& arrayTable, const BscVarTable& varTable )
00191 {
00192         B_ASSERT( term != 0 );
00193         B_ASSERT( tokens != 0 );
00194 
00196         unsigned int tokensRead = 0;
00197 
00199         if ( tokens[ 0 ].tokenId == BL_LPAREN )
00200         {
00203                 ++tokensRead;
00204 
00206                 unsigned int termTokensRead = 0;
00207                 URef< UExprTerm > expr = 0;
00208                 tokensRead += BscParseExpr( &expr, tokens + tokensRead, arrayTable, varTable );
00209                 *term = expr;
00210 
00212                 B_ASSERT( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId == BL_RPAREN );
00213 
00215                 ++tokensRead;
00216         }
00217         else
00218         {
00220                 unsigned int termTokensRead = 0;
00221                 if ( BscIsNumber( tokens ) )
00222                 {
00223                         URef< UExprNumber > number;
00224                         tokensRead += BscParseNumber( &number, tokens );
00225                         *term = number;
00226                 }
00227                 else if ( BscIsArrayRef( tokens, arrayTable, varTable ) )
00228                 {
00229                         URef< UExprArrayRef > arrayRef;
00230                         tokensRead += BscParseArrayRef( &arrayRef, tokens, arrayTable, varTable );
00231                         *term = arrayRef;
00232                 }
00233                 else if ( BscIsCallback( tokens, varTable ) )
00234                 {
00236                         URef< UExprCallback > exprCallback = 0;
00237                         tokensRead += BscParseCallback( &exprCallback, tokens, varTable );
00238                         *term = ( UExprCallback* )exprCallback;
00239                 }
00240                 else
00241                 {
00243                         B_ASSERT( false );
00244                 }
00245         }
00246 
00248         return tokensRead;
00249 }

00251 //----------------------------------------------------------
00252 bool
00253 IsOp( const SBscToken* token )
00254 {
00255         B_ASSERT( token != 0 );
00256         unsigned int tokenId = token->tokenId;
00257         return ( tokenId == BL_PLUS || tokenId == BL_MINUS ||
00258                          tokenId == BL_ASTERISK || tokenId == BL_SLASH ||
00259                          tokenId == BL_PERCENT || tokenId == BL_LESS ||
00260                          tokenId == BL_GREATER || tokenId == BL_LESSEQUAL ||
00261                          tokenId == BL_GREATEREQUAL || tokenId == BL_NOTEQUAL ||
00262                          tokenId == BL_ISEQUAL || tokenId == BL_LOGICALAND ||
00263                          tokenId == BL_LOGICALOR );
00264 }

00271 //----------------------------------------------------------
00272 bool
00273 BscIsNumber( const SBscToken* tokens, unsigned int* tokensReadOut )
00274 {
00275         B_ASSERT( tokens != 0 );
00276 
00277         SafeOffset tokensRead( tokensReadOut );
00278 
00280         if ( tokens[ 0 ].tokenId == BL_PLUS || tokens[ 0 ].tokenId == BL_MINUS )
00281         {
00282                 tokensRead = 2;
00283                 return tokens[ 1 ].tokenId == BL_NUMBER;
00284         }
00285         tokensRead = 1;
00286         return ( tokens[ 0 ].tokenId == BL_NUMBER );
00287 }

00289 //----------------------------------------------------------
00290 unsigned int
00291 BscParseNumber( URef< UExprNumber >* numberOut, const SBscToken* tokens )
00292 {
00293         B_ASSERT( tokens != 0 );
00294         B_ASSERT( BscIsNumber( tokens ) );
00295 
00297         unsigned int tokensRead = 0;
00298         tstring text = tokens[ tokensRead ].text;
00299         if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId == BL_PLUS || tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId == BL_MINUS )
00300         {
00301                 ++tokensRead;
00302                 text += tokens[ tokensRead ].text;
00303         }
00304 
00306         B_ASSERT( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId == BL_NUMBER );
00307 
00309         ++tokensRead;
00310 
00312         float value = ( float )atof( text.c_str() );
00313         *numberOut = gUExprMgr->CreateNumber( value );
00314 
00315         return tokensRead;
00316 }

00323 //----------------------------------------------------------
00324 bool
00325 BscIsArrayRef( const SBscToken* tokens, const BscArrayTable& arrayTable, const BscVarTable& varTable, unsigned int* tokensReadOut )
00326 {
00327         SafeOffset tokensRead( tokensReadOut );
00328 
00330         tokensRead = 1;
00331         if ( tokens[ 0 ].tokenId != BL_IDENTIFIER )
00332                 return false;
00333 
00335         if ( arrayTable.FindArray( tokens[ 0 ].text ) == 0 )
00336                 return false;
00337 
00339         tokensRead = 2;
00340         if ( tokens[ 1 ].tokenId != BL_LSQUAREBRACE )
00341                 return false;
00342 
00344         unsigned int subTokensRead = 0;
00345         if ( !BscIsExpr( tokens + 2, arrayTable, varTable, &subTokensRead ) )
00346         {
00347                 tokensRead += subTokensRead;
00348                 return false;
00349         }
00350         tokensRead += subTokensRead;
00351 
00353         if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId != BL_RSQUAREBRACE )
00354         {
00355                 ++tokensRead;
00356                 return false;
00357         }
00358         ++tokensRead;
00359 
00361         return true;
00362 }

00364 //----------------------------------------------------------
00365 unsigned int
00366 BscParseArrayRef( URef< UExprArrayRef >* arrayRef, const SBscToken* tokens, const BscArrayTable& arrayTable, const BscVarTable& varTable )
00367 {
00368         B_ASSERT( BscIsArrayRef( tokens, arrayTable, varTable ) );
00369 
00371         URef< UExprTerm > expr = 0;
00372         unsigned int tokensRead = BscParseExpr( &expr, tokens + 2, arrayTable, varTable );
00373 
00375         tokensRead += 3;
00376 
00378         tstring arrayName = tokens[ 0 ].text;
00379 
00381         URef< UExprArray > array = arrayTable.FindArray( arrayName );
00382         *arrayRef = gUExprMgr->CreateArrayRef( array, expr );
00383 
00384         return tokensRead;
00385 }

00392 //----------------------------------------------------------
00393 bool
00394 BscIsCallback( const SBscToken* tokens, const BscVarTable& varTable, unsigned int* tokensReadOut )
00395 {
00396         SafeOffset tokensRead( tokensReadOut );
00397 
00398         tokensRead = 1;
00399         if ( tokens[ 0 ].tokenId != BL_IDENTIFIER )
00400                 return false;
00401 
00402         if ( varTable.FindVarCallback( tokens[ 0 ].text ) == 0 )
00403                 return false;
00404 
00406         return true;
00407 }

00410 unsigned int
00411 BscParseCallback( URef< UExprCallback >* callback, const SBscToken* tokens, const BscVarTable& varTable )
00412 {
00413         B_ASSERT( BscIsCallback( tokens, varTable ) );
00414         *callback = varTable.FindVarCallback( tokens[ 0 ].text );
00415         return 1;
00416 }

00423 //----------------------------------------------------------
00424 bool
00425 BscIsArray( const SBscToken* tokens, const BscArrayTable& arrayTable, const BscVarTable& varTable, unsigned int* tokensReadOut )
00426 {
00427         SafeOffset tokensRead( tokensReadOut );
00428 
00431         tokensRead = 1;
00432         if ( _stricmp( tokens[ 0 ].text.c_str(), ARRAYKEYWORD ) != 0 )
00433                 return false;
00434 
00435         tokensRead = 2;
00436         if ( tokens[ 1 ].tokenId != BL_IDENTIFIER )
00437                 return false;
00438 
00439         bool clamp = false;
00440         bool smooth = false;
00441         bool scale = false;
00442 
00444         if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId == BL_LPAREN )
00445         {
00447                 ++tokensRead;
00448 
00450                 do
00451                 {
00452                         if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId == BL_IDENTIFIER )
00453                         {
00454                                 if ( _stricmp( tokens[ tokensRead ].text.c_str(), "smooth" ) == 0 )
00455                                 {
00456                                         if ( smooth )
00457                                                 return false;
00458                                         ++tokensRead;
00459                                         smooth = true;
00460                                 }
00461                                 else if ( _stricmp( tokens[ tokensRead ].text.c_str(), "clamp" ) == 0 )
00462                                 {
00463                                         if ( clamp )
00464                                                 return false;
00465                                         ++tokensRead;
00466                                         clamp = true;
00467                                 }
00468                                 else
00469                                 {
00470                                         return false;
00471                                 }
00472                         }
00473                         else if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId == BL_NUMBER )
00474                         {
00476                                 if ( scale )
00477                                         return false;
00478                                 ++tokensRead;
00479                                 scale = true;
00480                         }
00481                         else
00482                         {
00483                                 break;
00484                         }
00485 
00486                         if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId != BL_COMMA )
00487                         {
00489                                 if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId == BL_RPAREN )
00490                                 {
00491                                         ++tokensRead;
00492                                         break;
00493                                 }
00494                                 else
00495                                         return false;
00496                         }
00498                         ++tokensRead;
00499                 } while ( true );
00500         }
00501 
00503 //      if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId != BL_EQUALS )
00504 //      {
00505 //              return false;
00506 //      }
00507 //      ++tokensRead;
00508 
00509         if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId != BL_LBRACE )
00510         {
00511                 return false;
00512         }
00513         ++tokensRead;
00514 
00515         do
00516         {
00517                 unsigned int subTokensRead = 0;
00518                 if ( !BscIsExpr( tokens + tokensRead, arrayTable, varTable, &subTokensRead ) )
00519                 {
00520                         tokensRead += subTokensRead;
00521                         return false;
00522                 }
00523 
00524                 tokensRead += subTokensRead;
00525 
00526                 if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId == BL_COMMA )
00527                 {
00529                         ++tokensRead;
00530 
00532                         if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId == BL_RBRACE )
00533                                 break;
00534                 }
00535                 else
00536                 {
00538                         break;
00539                 }
00540 
00542         } while ( true );
00543 
00544         if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId != BL_RBRACE )
00545         {
00546                 ++tokensRead;
00547                 return false;
00548         }
00549 
00550         return true;
00551 }

00553 //----------------------------------------------------------
00554 unsigned int
00555 BscParseArray( UExprArray** arrayOut, tstring& name, const SBscToken* tokens, const BscArrayTable& arrayTable,
00556                            const BscVarTable& varTable )
00557 {
00559         B_ASSERT( BscIsArray( tokens, arrayTable, varTable ) );
00560 
00561         name = tokens[ 1 ].text;
00562 
00563         float indexScale = 1.0f;
00564         bool smooth = false;
00565         bool clamp = false;
00566 
00568         unsigned int tokensRead = 2;
00569 
00571         if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId == BL_LPAREN )
00572         {
00574                 ++tokensRead;
00575 
00577                 do
00578                 {
00579                         if ( _stricmp( tokens[ tokensRead ].text.c_str(), "smooth" ) == 0 )
00580                         {
00581                                 ++tokensRead;
00582                                 smooth = true;
00583                         }
00584                         else if ( _stricmp( tokens[ tokensRead ].text.c_str(), "clamp" ) == 0 )
00585                         {
00586                                 ++tokensRead;
00587                                 clamp = true;
00588                         }
00589                         else if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId == BL_NUMBER )
00590                         {
00591                                 ++tokensRead;
00592                                 indexScale = ( float )atof( tokens[ tokensRead ].text.c_str() );
00593                         }
00594                         else
00595                         {
00598                                 B_ASSERT( false );
00599                         }
00600 
00603                         if ( tokens[ tokensRead++ ].tokenId != BL_COMMA )
00604                         {
00606                                 break;
00607                         }
00608 
00609                 } while ( true );
00610         }
00611 
00612         URef< UExprArray > array = gUExprMgr->CreateArray( name, indexScale, smooth, clamp );
00613 
00614 //      //! advance past the equals sign and left brace.
00615 //      tokensRead += 2;
00616 
00618         tokensRead += 1;
00619 
00621         unsigned int subTokensRead = 0;
00622         do
00623         {
00624                 if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId == BL_RBRACE )
00625                 {
00626                         ++tokensRead;
00627                         break;
00628                 }
00629                 if ( BscIsExpr( tokens + tokensRead, arrayTable, varTable, &subTokensRead ) )
00630                 {
00631                         URef< UExprTerm > expr = 0;
00632                         tokensRead += BscParseExpr( &expr, tokens + tokensRead, arrayTable, varTable );
00633                         array->AddElement( expr );
00634                 }
00635                 if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId == BL_COMMA )
00636                 {
00637                         ++tokensRead;
00638                 }
00639         } while ( true );
00640 
00642         *arrayOut = array;
00643         return tokensRead;
00644 }
